content: शस्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [शंस्-क्त] {@--1@} Praised, extolled. {@--2@} Auspicious, happy. {@--3@} Right, best. {@--4@} Repeated. recited {@--5@} Best, excellent. {@--6@} Wounded, injured. {@--7@} Killed. --स्तं {@--1@} Happiness, welfare. {@--2@} Excellence, auspiciousness. {@--3@} The body. {@--4@} A finger-guard (अंगुलित्राण <ab>q. v.</ab>; also शस्तकं in this sense).
